stories.Title: Big tech companies may still need to cut jobs
stories.Description: The current contraction of the technology sector has already taken its toll on major companies, but analysts predict more layoffs will be necessary for the near future.
stories.Tweet: Big tech companies may still need to cut jobs 📦 The current contraction of the technology sector has already taken its toll on major companies, but analysts predict more layoffs will be necessary for the near future. # https://www.businessinsider.com/google-and-amazon-should-cut-more-jobs-analysts-say-2023-4

stories.Title: PC industry slump affects Apple's Mac revenue
stories.Description: Mac sales drop by 40% as post-pandemic struggles in the PC industry continue, analysts at IDC report.
stories.Tweet: PC industry slump affects Apple's Mac revenue 📦 Mac sales drop by 40% as post-pandemic struggles in the PC industry continue, analysts at IDC report. # https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/04/analysts-say-mac-sales-are-down-40-as-post-pandemic-pc-sales-slump-continues/

stories.Title: Alibaba introduces new AI-powered language model
stories.Description: An official large language model called 'Tongyi Qianwen' has been announced by the Chinese tech giant as a response to ChatGPT's popularity.
stories.Tweet: Alibaba introduces new AI-powered language model 📦 An official large language model called 'Tongyi Qianwen' has been announced by the Chinese tech giant as a response to ChatGPT's popularity. # https://edition.cnn.com/2023/04/11/tech/china-alibaba-ai-chatbot-announcement-intl-hnk/index.html

stories.Title: The future of news is here and now
stories.Description: A new AI-generated virtual news presenter, called Fedha, has been introduced by a Kuwaiti media outlet.
stories.Tweet: The future of news is here and now 📦 A new AI-generated virtual news presenter, called Fedha, has been introduced by a Kuwaiti media outlet. # https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2023/4/10/ai-generated-news-presenter-appears-in-kuwait

stories.Title: Is your password vulnerable to AI attacks?
stories.Description: Researchers confirm that a special artificial intelligence program can crack 7-character passwords in less than 6 minutes.
stories.Tweet: Is your password vulnerable to AI attacks? 📦 Researchers confirm that a special artificial intelligence program can crack 7-character passwords in less than 6 minutes. # https://tech.co/news/ai-can-guess-your-password

stories.Title: Which AI is more useful?
stories.Description: Using ChatGPT, Bing, and Google Bard as examples, here's how to figure out which chatbot is the best.

stories.Title: EVs are a new problem to decaying infrastructure
stories.Description: Authorities in the UK are worried about the susceptibility of old parking garages to collapse due to the weight of electric vehicles.
stories.Tweet: EVs are a new problem to decaying infrastructure 📦 Authorities in the UK are worried about the susceptibility of old parking garages to collapse due to the weight of electric vehicles. # https://www.thedrive.com/news/heavy-evs-could-collapse-old-parking-garages-report

stories.Title: Sateliot's Mission: Bring mobile connectivity to everyone... Everywhere
stories.Description: This Spanish startup plans to launch low-earth orbit satellites to provide text messaging services at remote locations.
stories.Tweet: Sateliot's Mission: Bring mobile connectivity to everyone... Everywhere 📦 This Spanish startup plans to launch low-earth orbit satellites to provide text messaging services at remote locations. # https://www.cnet.com/home/internet/spacex-launch-begins-startups-plan-cell-towers-in-space/

stories.Title: San Francisco's traffic nightmare
stories.Description: Driverless vehicles blocking buses and trains in San Francisco cause disruption in traffic, as shown in new footage obtained by Wired.

stories.Title: Be careful of what you're tweeting
stories.Description: Twitter users are concerned as ‘Circle Tweets’, intended for a private audience, are now surfacing on the algorithmically generated 'For You' timeline.
stories.Tweet: Be careful of what you're tweeting 📦 Twitter users are concerned as ‘Circle Tweets’, intended for a private audience, are now surfacing on the algorithmically generated 'For You' timeline. # https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/10/twitter-circle-bug-not-private/
